```
    ➋ push(5)
```

```
import struct
v = [float(i[:-1])/4093.0 for i in open("random.txt")]
s = struct.pack('d'*len(v), *v)
with open("random.dat","wb") as f:
    f.write(s)
```

```
> corr_test 3 random.dat
corr = 0.00047 (n=2333347), expected 95% CI=[-0.00131, 0.00131], 
       test PASSED
```
